gr.forth.ics.swkm.model2
Interface Model.QueryBuilder

Enclosing interface:
Model
public static interface Model.QueryBuilder

Builder of a triple query, which can be used to either select and report triples or delete them.

Method Summary
 boolean delete()
          Deletes the triples that match all (if any) the specified criteria (on named graph, subject, predicate, object).

          Returns the triples that match all (if any) the specified criteria (on named graph, subject, predicate, object).

Method Detail

g

Model.QueryBuilder g(String namedGraph)
Specifies that only triples in the specified named graph are to be selected.

Only one g(...) overloaded method can be called in each query.

This method is equivalent to g(model.mapResource(namedGraph))

Parameters:
namedGraph - only triples contained in this are selected
Returns:
this
Throws:
Uri.UriFormatException - if Model.mapResource(String) throws this exception

fetch

Triples fetch()
Returns the triples that match all (if any) the specified criteria (on named graph, subject, predicate, object). Triple objects are allowed to be reported multiple times, if they are contained in multiple named graphs and no specific namedGraph is required by the query, but is not guarranteed.

Note: The returned iterable creates iterators that do not support Iterator.remove() method. See other ways to delete triples from a model.

Returns:
Triples the triples that match all (if any) the specified criteria

delete

boolean delete()
Deletes the triples that match all (if any) the specified criteria (on named graph, subject, predicate, object).

If a specific named graph is required, then selected triples are not completely deleted from the owner model, but they are simply removed from that specific named graph.

Important: After triple deletions, the typing of the nodes is guarranteed to remain valid and consistent, but it is no longer guarranteed to be minimal. Strongly consider invoking Model.retypeNodes() after triple deletions (see the method specification for further details).

Returns:
true if any triple was actually deleted
